entry.title: Bitcoin XT 0.11A
entry.summary: The email mentioned that making baseless accusations is unprofessional and harmful to the consensus-building process. The sender of the response, however, disagrees with the accusation of baselessness, and instead saw a discussion on conflicts of interest. The email accuses the responders of preventing discussions of risks associated with code development and creating an atmosphere where people are blackballed for raising legitimate concerns. The email suggests treating Bitcoin as a technology rather than a cult religion and advises being prepared for future hard fork controversies or potential schemes to buy cheap coins.
